member.name: T:SenseNet.Client.ClientContext
member.summary: Holds globally available context properties (e.g. username, urls, etc.). Please fill the properties of the ClientContext.Current singleton instance.

member.name: T:SenseNet.Client.ErrorData
member.summary: Represents the properties of the exception thrown by the server.

member.name: T:SenseNet.Client.Content
member.summary: This is the central class for all content-related client operations. It has several predefined content properties, but can be extended with custom fields as it is a dynamic type.

member.name: M:SenseNet.Client.Importer.ImportAsync(System.String,System.String,SenseNet.Client.ImportOptions)
member.summary: Imports files and folders from the file system to the content repository through its REST API.
member.param: File system path (folder or file) to import.
Content Repository path to import to.

member.name: T:SenseNet.Client.Logging.LoggerBase
member.summary: Abstract base class that contains basic logging functionality. Sends messages to the trace log and to the event log (if the logging level is not verbose).

member.name: P:SenseNet.Client.Logging.LoggerBase.LogPrefix
member.summary: A constant prefix that wil be added to the beginning of all messages.

member.name: T:SenseNet.Client.Logging.TraceLogger
member.summary: A default, empty implementation of ILogger. It only sends messages to the trace.

member.name: M:SenseNet.Client.ODataRequest.GetItemUrlBase
member.summary: Creates the first path of the url, without properties and parameters
